## SnapTurnControllerOptions interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SnapTurnControllerOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [activeThreshold?](./three-xr-controller.snapturncontrolleroptions.activethreshold.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Threshold to determine when a gamepad (ex. 3D Stick) is pressed. Default is 0.7. |
|  [deactiveThreshold?](./three-xr-controller.snapturncontrolleroptions.deactivethreshold.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Threshold for determining when the gamepad (e.g., 3D Stick) is released. Default is 0.5. |
|  [onTurn?](./three-xr-controller.snapturncontrolleroptions.onturn.md) |  | () =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ Event handler called when SnapTurn is executed. |
|  [turnAmount?](./three-xr-controller.snapturncontrolleroptions.turnamount.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Radian angle of rotation amount. Default is degToRad(45). |
